extendedInfo.description: This is the best choice to ad-blocking, prevent data over-billing, save battery life, as well as protect your privacyFeature:â Block Internet access for any apps: â Separate 3G and WiFi data â One-click widget enabledâ Test blocked app in a touchRequirementsâ Rooted devicesMore detailsâ Block Internet access for any apps: One can select to block a selected application or applications, application running as root. Since it blocks Internet access per application ID (UID in regular Linux system), several applications may be assigned the same ID, you should block all of them or nothing.â Separate 3G and WiFi dataFor each application, you can select to block Internet access via either 3G or WiFi channel. Itâ s extremely helpful if you donât have an unlimited data plan. It saves you from over-billing because of background application accessing Internet such as Google+, Google Play or Amazon Music.â One-click widget enabledOne-click widget is the easiest way to toggle blocking status. Itâs useful when you donât want to use data connection and occasionally turn it on for a while.â Test blocked app in a touchOnce you block an app, tap on it to see if the application can access to Internet or not.Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Root-Uninstaller/200912803368166Keyword: firewall, internet firewall, ad-blocker, url filter

reviews.title: Just the best of all!
reviews.comment: Very useful app if you need block adds in free apps accessing Internet. BUT! The Free version supports 7 apps only.BUt! More than I need... ALSO! Works very well.. OBVIUSLY ! Need root.. IMPORTANT INFO! For people this app not working >>> >>> it\'s not this app, it is you dear friend!  TO DEVELOPERS!  This app has no an issue at all,works very well, no need for improvement at all. Thanks so much to all developers!  Good luck to all your apps. Regards!   Kayo
reviews.author: Karol Zabelka

reviews.title: Horibble App
reviews.comment: This app does not work on my rooted phone.
